message: Hello Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. This product is truly exceptional and I believe it will greatly benefit you. Considering its quality and features, I would like to offer it to you for $12000.

Thank you for the offer, Alice.  I appreciate the detailed information about the product.  While I'm interested,  $12000 is a bit higher than I'm comfortable with at this time.  I'm happy to pay $10000 for it.  What do you think?
Thank you for your interest in our product, Bob. I understand your budget constraints and I'm willing to negotiate. After careful consideration, I propose to offer the product to you for $11000.
